articles.title: Becca Balint will win the Democratic nomination for Vermont's House seat, CNN projects
articles.description: Becca Balint will win the Democratic primary for Vermont's lone House seat, CNN projects, putting her on a path to become the first woman to represent the state in Congress.
articles.content:
(CNN)Becca Balint will win the Democratic primary for Vermont's lone House seat, CNN projects, putting her on a path to become the first woman to represent the state in Congress.

articles.author: Natasha Bertrand, CNN
articles.title: Russians have begun training on Iranian drones, US believes
articles.description: The US believes Russian officials have begun training on drones in Iran over the last several weeks, the latest sign that Russia intends to purchase the systems as the war in Ukraine continues.

articles.title: Watch Trump loyalists slam FBI's Mar-a-Lago search as 'third-world' mistake - CNN Video
articles.description: The FBI's search of former President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort ignited furious commentary from his supporters. Here's some of the incendiary reactions that aired on TV within hours of the news.

articles.title: What's at stake in the 2022 midterm elections - CNN Video
articles.description: What happens in the 2022 midterm elections will shape the rest of President Biden's first term. CNN's Ryan Nobles explains.

articles.title: Wisconsin's GOP gubernatorial primary tests Trump's influence amid political fallout of FBI search
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump's clout with Republican voters in a key swing state will be tested again on Tuesday as the fallout from the FBI search of his Florida resort mushrooms across the political landscape.

articles.author: Nick Paton Walsh, Daria Markina, Sebastian Shukla, Oleksandra Ochman and Darya Tarasova, CNN
articles.title: Russia dangles freedom to prisoners if they fight in Ukraine. Many are taking the deadly gamble.
articles.description: Promises of freedom and riches are made to convicts in cramped jail cells. Frantic phone calls ensue between relatives and inmates weighing the offer. Then prisoners vanish, leaving their loved ones to sift through reports of the wounded arriving in hospitals.

articles.author: Nouran Salahieh and Amir Vera, CNN
articles.title: Albuquerque police identify and charge 'primary suspect' in killings of Muslim men, police say
articles.description: Police have tracked down a vehicle in connection with the "recent murder of a Muslim man" and the driver -- identified as a "primary suspect" -- was detained, Albuquerque Police Chief Harold Medina tweeted Tuesday.
